name: Aviation Security Services Association - International
goal:
The association’s purpose is to defend the interests of the aviation security providers, which are members of the association.

The activities of the members have an international scope and involve the surveillance and the protection of civil aviation, in particular as regards the inspection of individuals and the inspection of luggage and cargo, as well as any other relevant security measure.

In order to be able to defend the interests of the members, ASSA-I set itself the following objectives.

Representing and promoting the interests of its members vis-à-vis commercial organisations and public authorities.
Promoting its members' activities, including the surveillance and protection of the civil aviation and airport areas.
Communicating to public authorities and to the general public.
Collecting and distributing any relevant information concerning the association's purpose, to benefit its members,
Carrying out studies concerning the technologies used to improve the security of employees and facilities within the airport areas.
Developing the mandatory security standards aimed at its members and its employees.
Formulating recommendations to its members, to applicants and to the relevant public authorities.
interests: Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Competition, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation, Transport
